title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs with grated Parmesan and black pepper.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat and mix in the egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 4 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Prepare a sauce with tomato puree, spices, and cream.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
